title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 733.11 - Retention periods designated "destroy at option"
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 733.11 - Retention periods designated "destroy at option"
State Regulations

Use of the retention period, "destroy at option," in the
regulations in this Part constitutes authorization for such destruction under
the conditions specified for the particular types of records, only if such
optional destruction is appropriate in view of the limited managerial interest
in such records and if such optional destruction is not in conflict with other
legal retention requirements or the usefulness of such records in satisfying
pending regulatory actions or directives. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
733.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
